name: Lethal Beach
description:
Game Background
This is an RPG survival game
You will become our protagonist - a girl living on a deserted island
You live alone on a dangerous island
-----
Game gameplay
Combat-
You need to eliminate unknown creatures on the island to ensure your safety
All weapons need to be handmade by you
Collect-
Overcoming all difficulties, collecting survival supplies, food, water, etc
Construction-
To build your own safe house, you need to collect multiple materials to go to the earlier safe house
fishing
Make your own fishing rod and then fish
plant
---
The ultimate goal is to survive on an isolated island, doing everything possible, just to survive
